Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Keeler
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Orange Line, 59th, Pulaski and 55th due to street blockage near 55th/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Orange Line, 59th, Pulaski and 55th due to street blockage near 55th/Keeler.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
